generated_doNotEdit.title: Grass Appearance
generated_doNotEdit.description: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

fields.title: Grass Is Shaded
fields.description: Adds a shading effect to the grass as if there was a roof.
